I'll close by saying that this pandemic only exacerbated the childcare crisis. I've been working on this issue my entire time in the Senate—the way we do childcare in this country needs an overhaul.  So let's make sure childcare survives this crisis AND fix the system long-term.
This isn't just the right thing to do it's also an investment. Working moms contribute a huge amount to our workforce if communities lack childcare we are risking hamstringing our economic recovery.
